ISSUE.TITLE: Support for now() helper function in SQL Queries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently OrchardCore has few helper functions to play with dates, it would be good to also have **now()** function which could return current **DateTime** (utc). I've adjusted YesSql Dialects: https://github.com/lampersky/yessql/commit/051a39ddf7ef4d1836cadad4074b6dc737e8ab01 And also have updated **SqlParser** and **SqlGrammar** to support functions without any arguments: https://github.com/lampersky/OrchardCore/commit/6ce16c12eee05c03d50a0ba98cf36b52340c5060 /cc @sebastienros

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: support for "now" function which returns current DateTime in Utc
